channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Top analyst Tom Lee on gold’s black swan risk: Elon Musk becoming ‘the new central bank’
item.description: "It all fits in a swimming pool, all the gold in the world," the Fundstrat head of research said. Plus, it's "extraterrestrial."

item.title: Nestlé’s CEO drinks 8 coffees a day, but says Gen Z staffers are his secret to staying sharp by ‘learning constantly’
item.description: In his company turnaround effort, Nestlé CEO Philipp Navratil is drinking twice as much coffee as the average American to stay fueled—while admitting ...

item.title: Federal Judge Blocks Texas Law Targeting Critics of Fossil Fuels
item.description: The court ruled that it was unconstitutional to bar state agencies from investing with firms that the state had accused of boycotting the oil industry...

item.title: Gen Z are rebelling against TikTok USA by installing another app—founded by an Oracle alum
item.description: TikTok USA isn't just (arguably) a tool of corporate power, it doesn't seem to work as well as the old TikTok.

item.title: At Ukraine’s Request, Starlink Denies Internet Access to Russian Troops

item.title: Camera Was Disconnected From Nancy Guthrie’s Home Shortly Before Disappearance
item.description: The authorities confirmed that blood on Ms. Guthrie’s doorstep belonged to her. Her daughter Savannah, the “Today” anchor, released a video asking for...

item.title: OpenAI’s new model leaps ahead in coding capabilities—but raises unprecedented cybersecurity risks
item.description: Why OpenAI’s latest coding breakthrough is forcing the company to rethink how—and how fast—it can deploy its most powerful models

item.title: Carney Increases E.V. Investments as Trump’s Trade Policy Disrupts Canada’s Auto Industry

item.title: Rocket CEO says U.S. mortgage industry is a ‘tale of two cities.’ His booming business shows a broader reality for American homebuyers
item.description: “Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest that they've been in the past three years,” Varun Krishna said, “and Rocket was right there to capitalize.”

item.title: It’s Time for the Olympics
item.description: The Games are supposed to bring people from around the globe together, but there’s no escaping politics.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Drops as Crypto Industry Faces Another Slump
item.description: The price of Bitcoin is now lower than when President Trump was elected in 2024, raising concerns of a new “crypto winter” in the industry.

item.title: Italy Toughens Protest Laws, Hours Before Planned Rallies at Winter Olympics
item.description: The restrictions could affect people demonstrating this weekend outside Olympic events in northern Italy.

item.title: At a Bonobo’s ‘Tea Party,’ Scientists Find Hints of Imagination
item.description: In a playtime experiment, researchers found that our closest living relatives have the capacity for make-believe, too.
